slide1.title: Welcome to IYTE56
slide1.description: The forum app for IYTE students. Share your thoughts, ask questions, and connect with your campus community.

slide2.title: Your Privacy Matters
slide2.description: Post anonymously or publicly - it's your choice. Express yourself freely while your identity stays protected when you choose.

slide3.title: Safe Community
slide3.description: All content is moderated to ensure a respectful environment. Even anonymous posts are traceable for safety purposes.

slide4.title: Student Verification
slide4.description: To ensure you're an IYTE student, we'll send a verification link to your student email (@std.iyte.edu.tr).
